Text:
Can anyone explain to me why Smash 720p versions are always so low in quality compared to 720p versions of other TV shows?  The sound is completely inaudible and it's not the first time it's happened!!!

Why is the file size so low for a 720p?  Why is the sound so bad?  I'm actually going to watch the HDTV x264-LOL version and hope the quality is higher, which shouldn't be hard seeing how low quality Smash 720p versions are.
